content: This Spanish artist, famous for his surrealistic paintings, had a notable eccentric personality and signature mustache. Who is he?

You're referring to Salvador Dalí, the renowned Spanish Surrealist artist known for his eccentric personality and distinctive mustache. His works often featured dreamlike scenarios and bizarre, distorted figures, challenging the boundaries of reality and imagination. Some of his most famous paintings include "The Persistence of Memory" and "Swans Reflecting Elephants." Dalí's unique style and persona made him one of the most recognizable figures in the art world.
